title.narrative: Output 3.1: The most vulnerable children have equitable access to basic learning opportunities (Access)

description.narrative: In collaboration with education sector partners, UNICEF in 2019 provided access to education opportunities to estimated more than 253,400 conflict-affected children (estimated 48 per cent girls) through community-based classes, (CBCs), school-infrastructure works, provision of basic school materials and provision of incentives for voluntary teachers. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:01/01/2020
